concept.title: Buying Seeds: Should I Go to Pierre's or JojaMart?
concept.shortdesc: There are main stores where you can buy seeds consistently: Pierre's General Store and JojaMart. Each store has its own hours, prices, and unique contributions to the storyline.

section.title: Pierre's General Store
section.p: While you can access the building until 9pm each day, Pierre will only be at the counter to buy and sell with the player from 9am to 5pm everyday except for Wednesdays*.
*Once the community center has bee restored, Pierre's will be open every day.
Pierre's General Store (aka Pierre's) is located in the north of Town Square and offers a variety of farming products. Seeds are offered seasonally, but he offers a variety of year-round stock:

ul.li: Apple, apricot, cherry, orange, peach and pomegranate saplings

section.p: You can also buy backpack upgrades from Pierre to unlock the second and third slots of your inventory.
